Blackfang got behind the pod, which was noticeably bigger than him, 
and pushed it all the was inside his companion. He got aboard, closed 
the door and strapped the pod with whatever he could.

Blackfang: The pod's good to go, Hot Rod. Let's go.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Yeah, I'll take it. Just get it in me."
> 
> Hot Rod transformed to car mode, next to the pod.
> 
> "Ok, lets do this and get back."
